sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form } from "reactstrap"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import TourData from "../assets/data/tours"; import "./toursdetails.css"; const ToursDetails = () => { const id = useParams(); const tour = TourData.find((tour) => tour.id === id); const { photo, title, desc, price, address, city, distance, maxGroupSize, avgRating } = tour; return (

{title}

{avgRating} {address}
{city} ${price} {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

Reviews({reviews?.lenght}reviews)
); }; export default ToursDetails;
